document_data.name: Retrigal Bookbinder
document_data.mainbody: '''Retrigal Bookbinder''' was a scholar who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Retrigal ventured into [[Neverwinter/Neverdeath|Neverdeath]] graveyard to investigate [[Lord Neverember]]'s claims of inheritance to the throne of Neverwinter. While parsing over some old records, Retrigal was assaulted by the risen [[undead]] and forced to seek the aid of a nearby [[human]] [[adventurer]] at [[Doomguide's Watch]].

He eventually found the [[Crypt of Vers Never|tomb]] of [[Vers Never]], but it was guarded by a particularly powerful undead guardian.
